SELECT a.accessories_id AS accessoriesId, a.accessories_name AS accessoriesName, a.material_type_id AS materialTypeId, a.classic_id AS classicId, a.sp_id AS spId, a.year_code AS yearCode, a.product_type_id AS productTypeId, a.serial_number AS serialNumber, a.pantone_id AS pantoneId, a.del_flag AS delFlag, a.remark AS remark, a.tech_required AS techRequired, a.length AS length, a.width AS width, a.update_time AS updateTime, a.position_id AS positionId, a.project_id AS projectId, a.bom_id AS bomId, b.unit_id AS unitId, b.unit_amount AS unitAmount, c.attrition_rate AS attritionRate, c.unit_price AS unitPrice, c.total_amount AS totalAmount, c.total_price AS totalPrice, c.color_price AS colorPrice, c.color_amount AS colorAmount, e.bom_name AS bomName, e.offer_amount AS orderCount FROM t_kf_accessories a INNER JOIN t_kf_bom_material k ON a.accessories_id = k.material_id AND k.bom_id = #{natrualkey} and a.del_flag=0 INNER JOIN t_kf_bominfo e on k.bom_id = e.bom_id AND e.del_flag=0 LEFT JOIN t_kf_material_unit_dosage b ON a.accessories_id = b.material_id LEFT JOIN t_kf_material_spinfo c ON a.accessories_id = c.material_id order by a.name_num ASC
